page.title: 14HILTON GRANGE SCHOOL
page.content: There are{83 boys and girls}from 7_19 at our school.We live and sleep at school.We live in flats.There are eight flats.There are twelve children in our flat & it is called{Fawcett {Spring}House.There are boys and girls in the same flat & I share a bedroom with one person.We have staff that just work in our flat and we have 11 teachers & 8 classes in our school.We have four lessons each day.School starts at 9 am and finishes at 3.50pm. Dinner time is 12 noon to 2 pm.The {children come from all over the {country.}I go home some times for the week end and for the holidays.We play on the green and we have a swimming pool and an adventure play ground.Also we have a farm with cows and sheep and sometimes we work on the farm.
